EmailTemplate.name: 10_29_2014 Stencils.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: Stencils for Visio and OmniGraffle Mid-Week Treat
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Something big is brewing in the VMTurbo lab {{lead.First Name:default=}}...
In the meantime, download these awesome FREE datacenter stencils. {{lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}}, Keep your eyes peeled in the coming weeks. Something big is coming. We can't handle the suspense either, so as consolation, please accept these 100% FREE datacenter stencils for Microsoft Visio® and OmniGraffle. Each stencil will dance off your topology map in full HD3D. Stencils include:
- Host - Cluster - Physical & Virtual SAN - Thick & Thin Provisioned Datastores - Public, Private, & Hybrid Cloud - OR request a tailor-made custom stencil <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/thread/1186?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=stencils&utm_content=102914> Get Free Stencils <http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=stencils&utm_content=102914> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. Share With A Friend <{{system.forwardToFriendLink:default=edit%20me}}>
